view

Class CheckOut

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.CheckOut

  • public class CheckOut
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Joey This class will provide the user view of the checkout screen. It will prompt the user to enter their credit card number and bulling address. After the customer enters this information, the correct profits will be added together and the quantity of the chosen item will be deducted.
